entry.name: AtkParam ID
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: atkId_Bullet
Description: Attack parameters for bullet impact.

entry.name: Projectile SFX ID
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: sfxId_Bullet
Description: SFX ID for bullet projectile.

entry.name: Impact SFX ID
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: sfxId_Hit
Description: SFX ID for bullet impact.

entry.name: Repel SFX ID
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: sfxId_Flick
Description: SFX ID for bullet repel.

entry.name: Duration
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: life
Description: Time before bullet will disappear on its own. -1 means it will last indefinitely.

entry.name: Attenuation Range
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: dist
Description: Distance at which attenuation of the projectile begins

entry.name: Shoot Interval
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: shootInterval
Description: Time between emitted bullets. Does nothing for bullets that only shoot once.

entry.name: Gravity: In Range
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: gravityInRange
Description: Downward acceleration of bullet.

entry.name: Gravity: Out of Range
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: gravityOutRange
Description: Downward acceleration of bullet after it passes the attenuation distance.

entry.name: Homing Stop Range
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: hormingStopRange
Description: Bullet will stop homing if it is within this distance of its homing target.

entry.name: Initial Velocity
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: initVellocity
Description: Initial speed of bullet.

entry.name: Acceleration: In Range
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: accelInRange
Description: Forward acceleration acting on bullet before it reaches the attenuation distance. Negative values will slow the bullet down.

entry.name: Acceleration: Out of Range
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: accelOutRange
Description: Forward acceleration acting on bullet after it passes the attenuation distance. Negative values will slow the bullet down.

entry.name: Max Velocity
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: maxVellocity
Description: Maximum speed of bullet, regardless of acceleration.

entry.name: Min Velocity
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: minVellocity
Description: Minimum speed of bullet, regardless of acceleration.

entry.name: Acceleration Duration
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: accelTime
Description: Time that acceleration is active after bullet creation.

entry.name: Homing Start Distance
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: homingBeginDist
Description: Distance from owner at which the bullet starts homing in on targets.

entry.name: Initial Hit Radius
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: hitRadius
Description: Initial hit radius of bullet projectile.

entry.name: Final Hit Radius
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: hitRadiusMax
Description: Final hit radius of bullet projectile. Set to -1 if radius does not change, which is always coupled with a value of 0 for RadiusIncreaseDuration.

entry.name: Radius Spread Time
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: spreadTime
Description: Time taken by bullet to transition from initial to final hit radius. Value of 0 are always coupled with values of -1 for RadiusIncreaseDuration.

entry.name: Explosion Delay
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: expDelay
Description: Delay between impact and 'explosion'.

entry.name: Homing Offset Range
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: hormingOffsetRange
Description: Offset homing position by this amount.

entry.name: Hitbox Duration
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: dmgHitRecordLifeTime
Description: Duration of bullet impact hitbox. A value of zero means it is disabled immediately after first impact.

entry.name: External Force in Bullet Direction
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: externalForce
Description: External force applied in the direction of shooting. (Y-axis is removed)

entry.name: Owner SpEffect ID
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: spEffectIDForShooter
Description: Special SpEffect applied to owner when bullet is created

entry.name: Bullet AI
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: autoSearchNPCThinkID
Description: AI parameter ID for triggered floating bullets.

entry.name: Hit Bullet ID
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: HitBulletID
Description: Bullet emitted on impact of this bullet.

entry.name: Target SpEffect ID 0
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: spEffectId0
Description: SpEffect applied to target hit by bullet.

entry.name: Target SpEffect ID 1
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: spEffectId1
Description: SpEffect applied to target hit by bullet.

entry.name: Target SpEffect ID 2
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: spEffectId2
Description: SpEffect applied to target hit by bullet.

entry.name: Target SpEffect ID 3
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: spEffectId3
Description: SpEffect applied to target hit by bullet.

entry.name: Target SpEffect ID 4
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: spEffectId4
Description: SpEffect applied to target hit by bullet.

entry.name: Bullet Count
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: numShoot
Description: Number of bullets emitted at once.

entry.name: Homing Angle
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: homingAngle
Description: Turning angle of homing bullet per second.

entry.name: Horizontal Shoot Angle
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: shootAngle
Description: Angle of first bullet in degrees around the vertical axis, relative to the forward direction.

entry.name: Shoot Angle - Horizontal Interval
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: shootAngleInterval
Description: Angle from one bullet to the next around the vertical axis, beginning at the azimuth angle start.

entry.name: Shoot Angle - Vertical Interval
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: shootAngleXInterval
Description: Angle between bullets in elevation.

entry.name: Damage Falloff: Physical
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: damageDamp
Description: Percentage reduction in physical damage per second.

entry.name: Damage Falloff: Magic
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: spelDamageDamp
Description: Percentage reduction in magic damage per second.

entry.name: Damage Falloff: Fire
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: fireDamageDamp
Description: Percentage reduction in fire damage per second.

entry.name: Damage Falloff: Lightning
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: thunderDamageDamp
Description: Percentage reduction in lightning damage per second.

entry.name: Damage Falloff: Stamina
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: staminaDamp
Description: Percentage reduction in stamina damage per second.

entry.name: Damage Falloff: Knockback
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: knockbackDamp
Description: Percentage reduction in knockback power per second.

entry.name: Vertical Shoot Angle
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: shootAngleXZ
Description: Angle of elevation of first bullet. Positive values will angle the bullets up and negative values will angle the bullets down.

entry.name: Lock Shoot Limit Angle
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: lockShootLimitAng
Description: Limit angle when facing the lock direction.

entry.name: Previous Velocity Direction Rate
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: prevVelocityDirRate
Description: Ratio of adding the previous moving direction to the current direction when a sliding bullet hits the wall.

entry.name: Attack Attribute
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: atkAttribute
Description: Set the physical attributes to set for the bullet.

entry.name: Effect Attribute
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: spAttribute
Description: Set special attributes to set for bullets.

entry.name: Material Attack Type
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: Material_AttackType
Description: Determines visual effects of bullet hit.

entry.name: Material Attack Material
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: Material_AttackMaterial
Description: Sound and visual effects on hit.

entry.name: Is Penetrate Character
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isPenetrateChr
Description: If it is ON, it will penetrate without landing when it hits the character.

entry.name: Is Penetrate Object
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isPenetrateObj
Description: If it is ON, it will penetrate without landing when hitting a dynamic / partial destruction asset.

entry.name: Launch Condition Type
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: launchConditionType
Description: Condition for determing if a new bullet will be generated when this bullet lands or expires.

entry.name: Follow Type: Soulmass
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: FollowType
Description: -

entry.name: Follow Type: Catalyst
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: FollowType
Description: -

entry.name: Follow Type: Follow Floor
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: FollowType
Description: -

entry.name: Emitter Type: Player Feet
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: EmittePosType
Description: -

entry.name: Emitter Type: Parent Bullet
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: EmittePosType
Description: -

entry.name: Emitter Type: Nearest Enemy Feet
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: EmittePosType
Description: -

entry.name: Persistent Attack FX
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: EmittePosType
Description: Set whether bullets stay stuck upon impact.

entry.name: Continuous Hitbox
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isEndlessHit
Description: Bullet hitbox is continuous.

entry.name: Penetrate Map
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isPenetrateMap
Description: Bullet will pierce the map.

entry.name: Hit Both Teams
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isHitBothTeam
Description: Bullet can hit any character.

entry.name: Use Shared Hit List
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isUseSharedHitList
Description: Repeating bullets share the amount of times they have hit a target.

entry.name: Use Multiple Dummy Polys
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isUseMultiDmyPolyIfPlace
Description: Set to True if the same model point ('damipoly') is used multiple times when spawning the bullet.

entry.name: Force Erase Bullet A if Hit by Other Bullet
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isHitOtherBulletForceEraseA
Description: Does it hit other bullets forced erasure A?

entry.name: Force Erase Bullet B if Hit by Other Bullet
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isHitOtherBulletForceEraseB
Description: Does it hit the other bullet forced erasure B?

entry.name: Is Bullet deflected by Magic
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isHitForceMagic
Description: If true, this bullet will impact appropriate Force-type magic (e.g. arrows, bolts, knives).

entry.name: Is SFX ignored on Water Hit
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isIgnoreSfxIfHitWater
Description: If true, hit FX are not produced if the bullet impacts water.

entry.name: Is Move State Ignored on Water Hit
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isIgnoreMoveStateIfHitWater
Description: Whether to ignore the state transition even if it hits water

entry.name: Is Bullet deflected by Bullet Deflection
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isHitDarkForceMagic
Description: If True, this bullet will be deflected by AtkParam deflection effect.

entry.name: Damage Calculation Side 1
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: dmgCalcSide
Description: Damage calculation side. During multiplayer, the damage calculation is for switching between the giving side and the receiving side.

entry.name: Damage Calculation Side 2
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: dmgCalcSide
Description: Damage calculation side. During multiplayer, the damage calculation is for switching between the giving side and the receiving side.

entry.name: Is Auto Homing Enabled
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isEnableAutoHoming
Description: Whether to automatically follow when not locked on

entry.name: Is Emitter Position Synced with Bullet
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isSyncBulletCulcDumypolyPos
Description: In the case of a synchronously generated bullet, the emitter attitude at the time of synchronization is used without recalculating the attitude due to the Damipoli position when the bullet is generated.

entry.name: Is Direction Inherited by Child Bullet
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isOwnerOverrideInitAngle
Description: Only valid for sub-bullets. If it is ON, the reference direction is the owner.

entry.name: Is SFX Inherited by Child Bullet
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isInheritSfxToChild
Description: Take over the SFX of the parent bullet. Ignore the SFX ID set for the sub bullet

entry.name: Damage Falloff: Dark Damage
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: darkDamageDamp
Description: Correction value that decreases in 1 second after the attenuation distance.

entry.name: Bullet SFX Delete Type - By Hit
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: bulletSfxDeleteType_byHit
Description: Bullet SFX extinction type when landing or playing

entry.name: Bullet SFX Delete Type - By Expiration
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: bulletSfxDeleteType_byLifeDead
Description: Bullet SFX extinction type at the end of life

entry.name: Landing Position - Vertical Offset Range
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: targetYOffsetRange
Description: Vertical offset of landing position. Shift the target position up and down at the time of launch and during homing. (-N ~ n)

entry.name: Firing Angle - Random Horizontal Range
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: shootAngleYMaxRandom
Description: Upper limit of random number of firing angle (0 to 360)

entry.name: Firing Angle - Random Vertical Range
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: shootAngleXMaxRandom
Description: Upper limit of firing elevation random number (0 to 360)

entry.name: Bullet Emitter: Bullet ID
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: intervalCreateBulletId
Description: Bullet ID used when making bullets at regular intervals

entry.name: Bullet Emitter: Minimum Shoot Interval
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: intervalCreateTimeMin
Description: Minimum interval for making bullets at regular intervals (0 to n)

entry.name: Bullet Emitter: Maximum Shoot Interval
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: intervalCreateTimeMax
Description: Maximum interval for making bullets at regular intervals (function is disabled if 0 to n 0)

entry.name: Prediction Shoot Observe Time
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: predictionShootObserveTime
Description: Average speed observation time of predicted shooting function (function is invalid if 0 to 40)

entry.name: Bullet Emitter: Initial Wait Time
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: intervalCreateWaitTime
Description: Waiting time to start making bullets at regular intervals

entry.name: SFX Pose Type
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: sfxPostureType
Description: Set the initial attitude of an SFX or sub-bullet created from a bullet

entry.name: Create Limit Group ID
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: createLimitGroupId
Description: If it is 0, it is unused. If the upper limit is reached when creating a bullet set in the same group Id, that bullet will not be created. (Bullets created synchronously on the network will be released regardless)

entry.name: Is Speed Inherited by Child Bullet
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isInheritSpeedToChild
Description: Take over the speed of the timing to replace the submunition. Ignore the speed set for the submunition

entry.name: Is SFX Disabled on Chr/Object Hit
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isDisableHitSfx_byChrAndObj
Description: When ON, the bullet parameter "landing SFX" does not play even if it hits a character / object.

entry.name: Is Wall Checked by Center Ray
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isCheckWall_byCenterRay
Description: There was a problem with the digging judgment when firing a bullet, so it is for error handling. [Own character] If you use a soul short arrow or a strong soul short arrow in close contact with a character with a high lock-on position, the direction of the bullet will be reversed.

entry.name: Is Hit Flare
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isHitFlare
Description: Do you hit flare magic?

entry.name: Is Bullet Wall Filter Used
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isUseBulletWallFilter
Description: Do you use primitive magic Atari? It will change to a filter that corresponds to the Atari dedicated to primitive magic.

entry.name: Blank
entry.description: Is a dummy field within a boolean set

entry.name: Is Follow Bullet Count not scaled by INT
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isNonDependenceMagicForFunnleNum
Description: The number of funnels in C does not fluctuate by force. Become the number of shots

entry.name: Is AI Interrupted by Bullet
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isAiInterruptShootNoDamageBullet
Description: Does it react to AI bullets (even with 0 attack power)?

entry.name: Emitter Position Radius
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: randomCreateRadius
Description: The range of bullets used when the source type is set to occur at random locations.

entry.name: Follow Bullet - Height Offset
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: followOffset_BaseHeight
Description: Funnel tracking position_base point height [m]

entry.name: Asset Generated on Hit
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: assetNo_Hit
Description: The number of the asset to be generated at the time of landing. -1: Do not generate. The asset number is the last 6 digits of the asset. Example: AEG999_999 = 999999

entry.name: Duration - Random Range
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: lifeRandomRange
Description: Add a random number of seconds with a fluctuation range of the set time to the "lifetime [s]".

entry.name: Homing Angle: X
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: homingAngleX
Description: Only the X-axis component of the inductive performance is changed. Do not change with -1

entry.name: Ballistic Calc Type
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: ballisticCalcType
Description: Ballistic calculation type

entry.name: Attach Effect Type
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: attachEffectType
Description: Effect type to attach

entry.name: Insert SE ID - Bullet [1]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: seId_Bullet1
Description: Insert SE ID1 for [Bullet]. -1: Not generated 9 digits. Sound type is fixed to s: SFX.

entry.name: Insert SE ID - Bullet [2]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: seId_Bullet2
Description: Insert SE ID 2 for [Bullet]. -1: Not generated 9 digits. Sound type is fixed to s: SFX.

entry.name: Insert SE ID - Hit
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: seId_Hit
Description: Insert SE ID 1 for [landing]. -1 does not occur. 9 digits. Sound type is fixed to s: SFX.

entry.name: Insert SE ID - Repel
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: seId_Flick
Description: [At the time of repelling] Enter SE ID1 for. -1 does not occur. 9 digits. Sound type is fixed to s: SFX.

entry.name: Howitzer - Minimum Shoot Angle: X
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: howitzerShootAngleXMin
Description: The lower limit [deg] with the firing elevation angle as a reference (0 deg) before applying the howitzer fire calculation.

entry.name: Howitzer - Maximum Shoot Angle: X
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: howitzerShootAngleXMax
Description: The upper limit [deg] based on the firing elevation angle (0deg) before applying the howitzer firing calculation.

entry.name: Howitzer - Minimum Initial Velocity
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: howitzerInitMinVelocity
Description: The minimum speed limit for howitzer firing calculation [m / s].

entry.name: Howitzer - Maximum Initial Velocity
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: howitzerInitMaxVelocity
Description: Maximum speed limit for howitzer firing calculation [m / s].

entry.name: SFX ID - Force Erase
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: sfxId_ForceErase
Description: SFX ID at the time of forced erasure. -1 does not occur.

entry.name: Bullet SFX Delete Type - By Force Erase
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: bulletSfxDeleteType_byForceErase
Description: Bullet SFX extinction type at the time of forced erasure.

entry.name: Follow Bullet - Dummy Poly for SFX Pose
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: followDmypoly_forSfxPose
Description: SFX direction specification when following Damipoli

entry.name: Follow Bullet - Radius Offset
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: followOffset_Radius
Description: Funnel tracking position_radius [m]

entry.name: SpEffect Bullet Distance - Magnification
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: spBulletDistUpRate
Description: Special effect flight distance correction magnification

entry.name: Target Range when Unlocked
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: nolockTargetDist
Description: Target range when unlocked (-1: Refer to "range", 0: No target)
